      • removeExtraAddonContendedTilePositions

        private void removeExtraAddonContendedTilePositions(bwapi.Unit unit)
        Function for removing any contended TilePositions that were contended by default to ensure the construction of any future addons. This function is directed towards Terran structures like the Terran_Factory that are able to construct an addon to change their behavior. These TilePositions must be freed again after the building is destroyed.
        Parameters:
        unit - the building whose addon spots are going to be reserved. Must be able to construct addons for this function to have any effect at all.

      • removeUnit

        private void removeUnit(bwapi.Unit unit)
        Function for removing a Unit from the collection of tracked Units.
        Parameters:
        unit - the Unit that is going to be removed.

      • addToUnitControl

        Parameters:
